question: She likes to read, ___ (but, and, or) she doesn't like writing.
He wanted to go to the park, ___ (but, so, because) it was raining.
I can stay home, ___ (or, but, because) I can go out with friends.
The sun is shining, ___ (but, so, because) it is still cold.
She studied hard, ___ (so, and, because) she passed the exam.
